preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 108 g of manganese powder using an accurate scale.
2. Measure 22 g of rubidium metal carefully, taking precautions due to its reactivity.
3. Weigh 64 g of sulfur powder.
4. Combine all three ingredients in a clean, dry container, ensuring the mixture is homogeneous.
